item.description:
This discussion class allows participants to share insights, stories and spiritual techniques to explore the next step in living a more spiritual life. Topics like "past lives", "dreams", and "Soul Travel" are explored, discussed, and refined for individual spiritual exploration. All are welcome. We will be studying chapter Two of The Shariyat-Ki-Sugmad, Book One next time.


Books are available for sale and to borrow during the class. There is no charge. A voluntary donation to cover room charges is always helpful when the participant can afford to contribute. The primary contribution is the insight and experiences each member brings to the discussion.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the desk. We are in the meeing room to the right of the breakfast room.
item.name: Shariyat-Ki-Sugmad Discussion Class
